1.「よく来たな <pc>。| 海底探索に協力してくれるのか？|<select_se: Glad you could come, <pc>.|Would you like to assist in the undersea|exploration?|<select_se_off>|Undersea Exploration|View Rewards|View Rankings|Explanation|View Rules|<select_end><break>

2.「あとは 何をするんだ？| 海底探索に 行きたそうな顔をしてるな？|<selec: What else do you need? You'd like to go|undersea exploring, wouldn't you?|<select_se_off>|Undersea Exploration|View Rewards|View Rankings|Explanation|View Rules|<select_end><break>

3.「私は ガテリア号に乗って| 海底探索を まだまだ続けていこうと思う。| 時間が: I'll continue exploring the ocean with the|Gateria. If you ever have the time, I'd really|appreciate the help!|<end>

4.「いいぞー！| ガテリア号に乗りこんで| 海底探索へ 出発するのだな？|<yes: Great! You ready to go exploring with the|Gateria?|<yesno><break>

5.「ときは来た！| さあ 海底探索に出発だ！|<end>: The time has come! The bottom of the ocean|awaits!<end>

6.「え やめるのか……？ うそだろ……？| ほんとうに やめちゃうのか……？| 気: What... you changed your mind...? Really...?|That's really too bad... I hope you'll change|your mind and come back...|<end>

7.「ときが来たら ガテリア号に乗って| また海底探索に 行こうと思う。| そのとき: When the time comes, we'll board the Gateria|and go exploring the ocean floor again. I'll|need your help then!|<end>

8.「今回の海底探索は もう充分にできた。| また次の機会に 協力を よろしく頼む！: I've had enough of this underwater|exploration. Next time, we'll need your help!<bw_break>

9.「むむ？| お前は パーティリーダーでは ないな。|<br>|「パーティリーダー: Hmm? You're not the party leader.|Tell them to come talk to me.|<bw_break>

10.「報酬を 見るのだな？|<select_se_off>|トータルスコア報酬|<s: You want to see the rewards?|<select_se_off>|Total Score Rewards|<select_end><break>

12.「これまでに 獲得した ポイントの合計で| これらの報酬を プレゼントするぞ！|: You'll receive these rewards based on the|total points you've earned so far!<break>

13.「むむ？ まだ ランキングが無いようだ。|<bw_break>: Hmm? Doesn't seem like there's any rankings|yet.|<bw_break>

14.「どの説明を 聞きたい？|<select_se_off>|潜水艇のパーツについて: Listen to which explanation?|<select_se_off>|About Submarine Parts|About Energy Gauge|About Skills|About Underwater Monsters|About Items|About Scores and Rewards|About Rankings|<select_end><break>

15.「ほかにも説明を 聞きたいのか？|<select_se_off>|潜水艇のパーツ: Any other explanations?|<select_se_off>|About Submarine Parts|About Energy Gauge|About Skills|About Underwater Monsters|About Items|About Scores and Rewards|About Rankings|<select_end><break>

16.「みなで協力して 船体の修理に必要な| パーツを集める。時間内に全てのパーツを|:
Everyone will work together to repair the|hull. If we succeed, we'll move onto the next|stage of repair.|
|The next step is to repair the engine. Make|sure to deliver all of the parts needed|within the time limit.|
|When both of those are fixed, it's time to|load the Gateria up with treasure!|
|You can bring the treasure to either a storage|zone or the ship itself. It's up to you!|
|You can get back onto the Gateria by using the|ladder. Don't take too much time with the|treasure though, you could miss the trip back!|

17.「ガテリア号の 修理に必要なパーツは| ねじ 電池 歯車の 三種類。| これらを:
The parts needed to repair the Gateria are|screws, batteries, and gears. I'd like them|to be collected and delivered.|
|Each part has a specific storage zone it needs|to be delivered to.|
|You can tell which part you're responsible for|by the icon above your head. You can't collect|the other types of parts.|
|However, if you collect all the parts you're|responsible for, you can start collecting the|other types too!|
|The crewmembers in white suits cannot collect|any parts.|
|Instead, they run faster than normal, and use|Cheer to give energy to those who need it.|
|They can also use Cheer on a fallen crewmate|who's been bitten by an Abyssal Shark! This|will allow them to move again immediately!|

19.「ダイバースーツの スキルについて| 説明するぞ。|<br>|「ひとつめは エー:
Diver suit skills, explained... The first|is... You can use it on a fallen comrade. If|you use it on a fallen comrade, it can even|
|wake them up, making it a powerful skill that|can be used over and over again! However...|But you can't ale yourself, and you can't ale|
|yourself if you have parts. You'll have to|think very carefully about whether or not you|want to get the parts. Secondly, Stun... The|
|second is a stun... which creates a powerful|electrical current around you... to ward off|dangerous creatures. Unfortunately, as|
|powerful as the effect is, it only fires one|shot per stun shell. Use it when the time is|right! Picking up more than one stun shell|
|won't increase the number of times you can|use it, so it's best to leave some for your|friends.

20.「協力してくれたお礼として| 私から トータルスコアに応じた| 報酬をわたそう！:
As a thank you for your help, I'll give you a|reward based on your total score! To see what|you'll get, go to "View Rewards"... I hope|
|you'll try your best to complete it!

21.「フレンドとチームメンバーの| ハイスコアの ランキングを| 見ることができるぞ: You can see the high score rankings of your|friends and team members... Try as many times|as you can to get a higher score!<bw_break>

22.「おお！ よくがんばってくれた！| 報酬を渡すぞ！|<bw_break>: Oh! You've done well! I'll give you a|reward!<bw_break>

The diver's suit has an energy gauge... An|energy gauge will tell you how much energy|you have left. As you turn over parts, your|
|energy level will decrease. When it reaches|zero, your diver suit will pause and you'll|be stuck in there until it restarts.
